symbol.name: N_spectrum
symbol.doc: Size of the wavelength array for which the refractive index of the material and/or coating is given.

symbol.name: N_wavelengths
symbol.doc: Number of discrete wavelengths for which the waveplate is designed. If it operates for a range of wavelengths then N_wavelengths = 2 and the minimum and maximum values of the range should be provided.

field.name: type
field.doc: Type of waveplate (e.g. achromatic waveplate or zero-order waveplate).

field.name: other_type
field.doc: If you selected 'other' in type describe what it is.

field.name: retardance
field.doc: Specify the retardance of the waveplate (e.g. full-wave, half-wave (lambda/2), quarter-wave (lambda/4) plate).

field.name: wavelengths
field.doc: Discrete wavelengths for which the waveplate is designed. If the waveplate operates over an entire range of wavelengths, enter the minimum and maximum values of the wavelength range (in this case N_wavelengths = 2).

field.name: clear_aperture
field.doc: Clear aperture of the device (e.g. 90% of diameter for a disc or 90% of length/height for square geometry).

group.name: substrate
group.doc: Describe the material of the substrate of the wave plate in substrate/substrate_material and provide its index of refraction in substrate/index_of_refraction_substrate, if known.

field.name: substrate_material
field.doc: Specify the material of the wave plate. If the device has a coating it should be described in coating/coating_material.

field.name: substrate_thickness
field.doc: Thickness of the wave plate substrate.

field.name: index_of_refration_substrate
field.doc: Complex index of refraction of the wave plate substrate. Specify at given wavelength (or energy, wavenumber etc.) values.

group.name: coating
group.doc: Is the wave plate coated? If yes, specify the type and material of the coating and the wavelength range for which it is designed. If known, you may also provide its index of refraction.

field.name: coating_type
field.doc: Specify the coating type (e.g. dielectric, anti-reflection (AR), multilayer coating etc.).

field.name: wavelength_range_coating
field.doc: Wavelength range for which the coating is designed. Enter the minimum and maximum values of the wavelength range.

field.name: index_of_refraction_coating
field.doc: Complex index of refraction of the coating. Specify at given spectral values (wavelength, energy, wavenumber etc.).

field.name: reflectance
field.doc: Average reflectance of the waveplate in percentage.
